RelatedSentence: - Nagorno - Karabakh Republic ( NKR ) , or Artsakh , President Bako Sahakyan on Sunday received the co-chairs of the OSCE Minsk Group .

At the beginning of the talk the President congratulated newly appointed French Co-Chair Pierre Andrieu for assuming this high post expressing hope that he will continue his active engagement in the settlement of the Azerbaijan - Karabakh conflict .

A0: Artsakh , President Bako Sahakyan on Sunday
RelatedSentence: Sahakyan also expressed gratitude to the former French Co-Chair Jacques Faure for his impartial and productive work , informed the Central Information Department of the Office of the NKR President .

A0: Artsakh , President Bako Sahakyan on Sunday
RelatedSentence: Reflecting on the Azerbaijani - Karabakh peace process , President Sahakyan stressed that official Stepanakert is committed to its peaceful settlement within the framework of the Minsk Group .
The President highlighted that freedom and independence are exceptional values for Artsakh and a return to the past , both in terms of status and borders , is impossible .
NKR Foreign Minister Karen Mirzoyan and several other officials also attended the meeting .
